name: DigimarcMobileSDK
summary: A comprehensive SDK for scanning Digimarc digital watermarks and the most common retail 1D barcodes & QR codes.
description:
The Digimarc Mobile SDK is a comprehensive and robust scanning SDK for Digimarc digital watermarks (Product Packaging, Thermal Label, Print Media, and Audio) as well as the most common traditional 1D barcodes found in retail & QR codes.

The Digimarc Mobile SDK also includes support to optionally query the Digimarc  Resolver for additional content and metadata related to the Digimarc-enhanced media your device is seeing and hearing in the world around you through the Digimarc Mobile SDK.

The Digimarc Mobile SDK easily scans dozens of traditional retail barcodes at distances of up to four feet away, and it handles challenging scanning situations such as glare, reflection, motion blurring, low contrast, poor camera alignment and wide viewing angles.
